meanings.definition: A person who is not yet an adult.
meanings.sent1: The preadult enjoyed playing with toys.
meanings.sent2: The preadult will become an adult soon.
meanings.sent3: The preadult pretended to be a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The preadult is like a caterpillar waiting to become a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The preadult's youthful energy was contagious.

meanings.definition: To be in the stage of development before reaching adulthood.
meanings.sent2: Puppies preadult quickly into full-grown dogs.
meanings.sent3: The plants preadulted in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent4: Ideas preadult in the creative minds of young inventors.
meanings.sent5: Dreams preadult into reality with hard work and determination.
